item.title: What is Vekllei?
item.description: Vekllei is a country in my alt-world; a utopian fever dream of googie aesthetics, participatory economics and nostalgia. Welcome to the â€˜Petticoat Projectâ€™, a collection of stories about a country and a girl.Â The concept is broken down into three sections: Author:Â for blog posts and articles on the Petticoat Project, utopian fiction, personal news item, etc. Character:Â for posts about Tzipora, people in her life, or otherwise events that occur during her time on Earth.
